sense.name: Physically remove weaponry from.
sense.examples: The U.S. is trying to get Russia to disarm. You must disarm your opponent so that you hold the weapon. We cannot simply tell American families to disarm; we must give them a reason to do so.

sense.name: Make less emotionally hostile; win over mentally or emotionally.
sense.examples: Her charm disarmed the prosecution lawyer completely. Sometimes it's hard to disarm yourself on a first date.
